attributes.action: Stop taxing this country into the 3rd world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
QE2 bridge toll should have stopped after "construction costs were covered".
Answer - 1.8 diesel van pays more than supercharged 4 litre Range Rover. TAX
Ken's 'con charge' was "not going to be raised for at least 10 years".
Answer - £5 to £8, and extended as soon as he was able. TAX
I could continue but I only have 1000 characters.
This and future governments should remember "let them eat cake".
We are an inventive,wealthy,creative country but we MUST start taking a sensible view of HOW MUCH INDIVIDUALS CAN AFFORD.
Gordon you have NO idea of the real world and REAL people are starting to grumble. It CANNOT be too long before the masses decide that things must change. 
Mandelson, Osbourne... is there a difference?. 
You would love us to be but we are NOT stupid. You are entertained by oligarchs and they expect nothing in return!!. Are the public REALLY that stupid??.  Simple answer.... No. 
YOU MUST START LISTENING or I fear for our country.

ACT NOW or pick up your P45

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.Your petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
